final.description: Default outbound tag. the first outbound will be used if empty.

auto_detect_interface.description: Bind outbound connections to the default NIC by default to prevent routing loops under tun.

override_android_vpn.description: Accept Android VPN as upstream NIC when `auto_detect_interface` enabled.

default_interface.description: Bind outbound connections to the specified NIC by default to prevent routing loops under tun.

default_domain_resolver.description: Set domain resolver to use for resolving domain names.

default_fallback_delay.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

method.description: `default`: Reply with TCP RST for TCP connections, and ICMP port unreachable for UDP packets. `drop`: Drop packets.

no_drop.description: If not enabled, `method` will be temporarily overwritten to `drop` after 50 triggers in 30s.

sniffer.description: Enabled sniffers. All sniffers enabled by default.

action.description: Resolve request destination from domain to IP addresses.

server.description: Specifies DNS server tag to use instead of selecting through DNS routing.

disable_cache.description: Disable cache and save cache in this query.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

__schema6.description: Username, see each inbound for details.

__schema30.description: Match process path using regular expression.

__schema39.description: Match if network is considered Metered.

__schema40.description: Match if network is in Low Data Mode.

__schema44.description: Make `ip_cidr` in rule-sets match the source IP.

__schema52.description: If enabled, for UDP proxy requests addressed to a domain, the original packet address will be sent in the response instead of the mapped domain.

__schema53.description: If enabled, attempts to connect UDP connection to the destination instead of listen.

__schema55.description: Fragment TLS handshakes to bypass firewalls.

__schema56.description: The fallback value used when TLS segmentation cannot automatically determine the wait time.

__schema57.description: Fragment TLS handshake into multiple TLS records to bypass firewalls.

process_path_regex.description: Match process path using regular expression.

network_is_expensive.description: Match if network is considered Metered.

network_is_constrained.description: Match if network is in Low Data Mode.

__schema58.description: DNS query type. Values can be integers or type name strings.

download_detour.description: Tag of the outbound to download rule-set.

server.description: Tag of a another server to resolve the domain name in the address.

strategy.description: The domain strategy for resolving the domain name in the address.

disable_cache.description: Disable cache and save cache in this query.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

fallback_delay.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

path.description: The path to the sing-geoip database.

download_url.description: The download URL of the sing-geoip database.

download_detour.description: The tag of the outbound to download the database.

path.description: The path to the sing-geosite database.

download_url.description: The download URL of the sing-geoip database.

download_detour.description: The tag of the outbound to download the database.
